ComicInfo.Title: Vicious Cycle: Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary: Johnny Blaze has escaped from Hell--but unfortunately, he wasn't alone: Lucifer has once again played Johnny for a fool and used him to hitch a ride onto the mortal plane. The Ghost Rider must now track down Lucifer and send him back to where he came from before the Devil succeeds in creating a new Hell...here on earth. This is no small task, but it is further complicated by both the fact that Lucifer hides behind many faces and that there are those--one very strange man, in particular--who would prefer Ghost Rider cease his mission immediately...or else.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-22 11:22:45. [CVDB107144]
ComicInfo.Editor: Axel Alonso, Joe Quesada, Michael O'Connor
